00058 static int surface_slot_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00059 {
00060     DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = NULL;
00061     Object *cObject = ED_object_context(C);
00062     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas;
00063     DynamicPaintSurface *surface;
00064 
00065     /* Make sure we're dealing with a canvas */
00066     pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(cObject, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
00067     if (!pmd || !pmd->canvas) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00068 
00069     canvas = pmd->canvas;
00070     surface = dynamicPaint_createNewSurface(canvas, CTX_data_scene(C));
00071 
00072     if (!surface) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00073 
00074     /* set preview for this surface only and set active */
00075     canvas->active_sur = 0;
00076     for (surface=surface->prev; surface; surface=surface->prev) {
00077                 surface->flags &= ~MOD_DPAINT_PREVIEW;
00078                 canvas->active_sur++;
00079     }
00080 
00081     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /* add surface slot */
00085 void DPAINT_OT_surface_slot_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00086 {
00087     /* identifiers */
00088     ot->name = "Add Surface Slot";
00089     ot->idname = "DPAINT_OT_surface_slot_add";
00090     ot->description = "Add a new Dynamic Paint surface slot";
00091     
00092     /* api callbacks */
00093     ot->exec = surface_slot_add_exec;
00094     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00095 
00096     /* flags */
00097     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00098 }

00100 static int surface_slot_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00101 {
00102     DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = NULL;
00103     Object *cObject = ED_object_context(C);
00104     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas;
00105     DynamicPaintSurface *surface;
00106     int id=0;
00107 
00108     /* Make sure we're dealing with a canvas */
00109     pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(cObject, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
00110     if (!pmd || !pmd->canvas) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00111 
00112     canvas = pmd->canvas;
00113     surface = canvas->surfaces.first;
00114 
00115     /* find active surface and remove it */
00116     for (; surface; surface=surface->next) {
00117         if (id == canvas->active_sur) {
00118                 canvas->active_sur -= 1;
00119                 dynamicPaint_freeSurface(surface);
00120                 break;
00121             }
00122         id++;
00123     }
00124 
00125     dynamicPaint_resetPreview(canvas);
00126     DAG_id_tag_update(&cObject->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00127     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, cObject);
00128 
00129     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00130 }
00131

00139     
00140     /* api callbacks */
00141     ot->exec = surface_slot_remove_exec;
00142     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00143 
00144     /* flags */
00145     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00146 }

00148 static int type_toggle_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00149 {
00150 
00151     Object *cObject = ED_object_context(C);
00152     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00153     DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(cObject, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
00154     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00155 
00156     if (!pmd) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00157 
00158     /* if type is already enabled, toggle it off */
00159     if (type == MOD_DYNAMICPAINT_TYPE_CANVAS && pmd->canvas) {
00160             dynamicPaint_freeCanvas(pmd);
00161     }
00162     else if (type == MOD_DYNAMICPAINT_TYPE_BRUSH && pmd->brush) {
00163             dynamicPaint_freeBrush(pmd);
00164     }
00165     /* else create a new type */
00166     else {
00167         if (!dynamicPaint_createType(pmd, type, scene))
00168             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00169     }
00170     
00171     /* update dependency */
00172     DAG_id_tag_update(&cObject->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00173     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, cObject);
00174     DAG_scene_sort(CTX_data_main(C), scene);
00175 
00176     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00177 }

00179 void DPAINT_OT_type_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
00180 {
00181     PropertyRNA *prop;
00182 
00183     /* identifiers */
00184     ot->name = "Toggle Type Active";
00185     ot->idname = "DPAINT_OT_type_toggle";
00186     ot->description = "Toggle whether given type is active or not";
00187     
00188     /* api callbacks */
00189     ot->exec = type_toggle_exec;
00190     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00191     
00192     /* flags */
00193     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00194     
00195     /* properties */
00196     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", prop_dynamicpaint_type_items, MOD_DYNAMICPAINT_TYPE_CANVAS, "Type", "");
00197     ot->prop = prop;
00198 }

00200 static int output_toggle_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00201 {
00202     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00203     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00204     DynamicPaintSurface *surface;
00205     DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
00206     int output= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "output"); /* currently only 1/0 */
00207 
00208     if (!pmd || !pmd->canvas) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00209     surface = get_activeSurface(pmd->canvas);
00210 
00211     /* if type is already enabled, toggle it off */
00212     if (surface->format == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_F_VERTEX) {
00213         int exists = dynamicPaint_outputLayerExists(surface, ob, output);
00214         const char *name;
00215         
00216         if (output == 0)
00217             name = surface->output_name;
00218         else
00219             name = surface->output_name2;
00220 
00221         /* Vertex Color Layer */
00222         if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
00223             if (!exists)
00224                 ED_mesh_color_add(C, scene, ob, ob->data, name, 1);
00225             else 
00226                 ED_mesh_color_remove_named(C, ob, ob->data, name);
00227         }
00228         /* Vertex Weight Layer */
00229         else if (surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_WEIGHT) {
00230             if (!exists) {
00231                 ED_vgroup_add_name(ob, name);
00232             }
00233             else {
00234                 bDeformGroup *defgroup = defgroup_find_name(ob, name);
00235                 if (defgroup) ED_vgroup_delete(ob, defgroup);
00236             }
00237         }
00238     }
00239 
00240     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00241 }

00243 void DPAINT_OT_output_toggle(wmOperatorType *ot)
00244 {
00245     static EnumPropertyItem prop_output_toggle_types[] = {
00246         {0, "A", 0, "Output A", ""},
00247         {1, "B", 0, "Output B", ""},
00248         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00249     };
00250 
00251     /* identifiers */
00252     ot->name = "Toggle Output Layer";
00253     ot->idname = "DPAINT_OT_output_toggle";
00254     ot->description = "Add or remove Dynamic Paint output data layer";
00255     
00256     /* api callbacks */
00257     ot->exec = output_toggle_exec;
00258     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00259     
00260     /* flags */
00261     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00262     
00263     /* properties */
00264     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "output", prop_output_toggle_types, 0, "Output Toggle", "");
00265 }

00268 /***************************** Image Sequence Baking ******************************/
00269 
00270 /*
00271  * Do actual bake operation. Loop through to-be-baked frames.
00272  * Returns 0 on failure.
00273  */
00274 static int dynamicPaint_bakeImageSequence(bContext *C, DynamicPaintSurface *surface, Object *cObject)
00275 {
00276     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas = surface->canvas;
00277     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00278     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00279     int frame = 1;
00280     int frames;
00281 
00282     frames = surface->end_frame - surface->start_frame + 1;
00283     if (frames <= 0) {BLI_strncpy(canvas->error, "No frames to bake.", sizeof(canvas->error)); return 0;}
00284 
00285     /* Set frame to start point (also inits modifier data) */
00286     frame = surface->start_frame;
00287     scene->r.cfra = (int)frame;
00288     ED_update_for_newframe(CTX_data_main(C), scene, win->screen, 1);
00289 
00290     /* Init surface */
00291     if (!dynamicPaint_createUVSurface(surface)) return 0;
00292 
00293     /* Loop through selected frames */
00294     for (frame=surface->start_frame; frame<=surface->end_frame; frame++)
00295     {
00296         float progress = (frame - surface->start_frame) / (float)frames * 100;
00297         surface->current_frame = frame;
00298 
00299         /* If user requested stop (esc), quit baking    */
00300         if (blender_test_break()) return 0;
00301 
00302         /* Update progress bar cursor */
00303         WM_timecursor(win, (int)progress);
00304 
00305         /* calculate a frame */
00306         scene->r.cfra = (int)frame;
00307         ED_update_for_newframe(CTX_data_main(C), scene, win->screen, 1);
00308         if (!dynamicPaint_calculateFrame(surface, scene, cObject, frame)) return 0;
00309 
00310         /*
00311          * Save output images
00312          */
00313         {
00314             char filename[FILE_MAX];
00315 
00316             /* primary output layer */
00317             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_OUT1) {
00318                 /* set filepath */
00319                 BLI_join_dirfile(filename, sizeof(filename), surface->image_output_path, surface->output_name);
00320                 BLI_path_frame(filename, frame, 4);
00321 
00322                 /* save image */
00323                 dynamicPaint_outputSurfaceImage(surface, filename, 0);
00324             }
00325             /* secondary output */
00326             if (surface->flags & MOD_DPAINT_OUT2 && surface->type == MOD_DPAINT_SURFACE_T_PAINT) {
00327                 /* set filepath */
00328                 BLI_join_dirfile(filename, sizeof(filename), surface->image_output_path, surface->output_name2);
00329                 BLI_path_frame(filename, frame, 4);
00330 
00331                 /* save image */
00332                 dynamicPaint_outputSurfaceImage(surface, filename, 1);
00333             }
00334         }
00335     }
00336     return 1;
00337 }
00338 
00339 
00340 /*
00341  * Bake Dynamic Paint image sequence surface
00342  */
00343 static int dynamicPaint_initBake(struct bContext *C, struct wmOperator *op)
00344 {
00345     DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = NULL;
00346     DynamicPaintCanvasSettings *canvas;
00347     Object *ob = ED_object_context(C);
00348     int status = 0;
00349     double timer = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00350     char result_str[80];
00351     DynamicPaintSurface *surface;
00352 
00353     /*
00354      * Get modifier data
00355      */
00356     pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_DynamicPaint);
00357     if (!pmd) {
00358         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Bake Failed: No Dynamic Paint modifier found.");
00359         return 0;
00360     }
00361 
00362     /* Make sure we're dealing with a canvas */
00363     canvas = pmd->canvas;
00364     if (!canvas) {
00365         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Bake Failed: Invalid Canvas.");
00366         return 0;
00367     }
00368     surface = get_activeSurface(canvas);
00369 
00370     /* Set state to baking and init surface */
00371     canvas->error[0] = '\0';
00372     canvas->flags |= MOD_DPAINT_BAKING;
00373     G.afbreek= 0;   /* reset blender_test_break*/
00374 
00375     /*  Bake Dynamic Paint  */
00376     status = dynamicPaint_bakeImageSequence(C, surface, ob);
00377     /* Clear bake */
00378     canvas->flags &= ~MOD_DPAINT_BAKING;
00379     WM_cursor_restore(CTX_wm_window(C));
00380     dynamicPaint_freeSurfaceData(surface);
00381 
00382     /* Bake was successful:
00383      *  Report for ended bake and how long it took */
00384     if (status) {
00385         /* Format time string   */
00386         char time_str[30];
00387         double time = PIL_check_seconds_timer() - timer;
00388         BLI_timestr(time, time_str);
00389 
00390         /* Show bake info */
00391         BLI_snprintf(result_str, sizeof(result_str), "Bake Complete! (%s)", time_str);
00392         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_INFO, result_str);
00393     }
00394     else {
00395         if (strlen(canvas->error)) { /* If an error occured */
00396             BLI_snprintf(result_str, sizeof(result_str), "Bake Failed: %s", canvas->error);
00397             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, result_str);
00398         }
00399         else {  /* User canceled the bake */
00400             BLI_strncpy(result_str, "Baking Cancelled!", sizeof(result_str));
00401             BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, result_str);
00402         }
00403     }
00404 
00405     return status;
00406 }
00407 
00408 static int dynamicpaint_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00409 {
00410     /* Bake dynamic paint */
00411     if (!dynamicPaint_initBake(C, op)) {
00412         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;}
00413 
00414     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00415 }
00416 
00417 void DPAINT_OT_bake(wmOperatorType *ot)
00418 {
00419     /* identifiers */
00420     ot->name = "Dynamic Paint Bake";
00421     ot->description = "Bake dynamic paint image sequence surface";
00422     ot->idname = "DPAINT_OT_bake";
00423     
00424     /* api callbacks */
00425     ot->exec = dynamicpaint_bake_exec;
00426     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00427 }
